title: Figure out plan for Mono flavors
body: We need to either teach the Sdk projects about Mono, or collapse the Mono differences into all run-time checks so there's no separate Mono binary (somewhat riskier).

nodes.body: One possibility: introduce a new `net471` (or something) TFM that we "know" is Mono; that allows multitargeting without SDK friction at the cost of mental overhead (and we'd have to be careful about packaging it).
Here is the plan going forward for Mono: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/7034#issuecomment-967257469
